title: List of all Android chat head  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android chat head  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: bubbles-for-android
repoList.description: Bubbles for Android is an Android library to provide chat heads capabilities on your apps. With a fast way to integrate with your development.

repoList.name: AppFloater
repoList.description: An Android app that creates an 'always on top' floating icon for any installed application. Similar to the Facebook app chat heads. Makes use of my Floater library.

repoList.name: FBChatHeadExample
repoList.description: Example of FB Messenger chat heads for Android,integrated with facebook rebound library

repoList.name: FloatingChatHead
repoList.description: A dummy floating chat head in android library

repoList.name: hover
repoList.description: Floating widget / Chat Heads / Floater library for android
